statements: SELECT * FROM organizations;
SELECT name, email FROM organizations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, email, data_to_anonymize FROM organizations WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT id, name FROM organizations ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM organizations WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, data_to_anonymize FROM organizations WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' AND id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM organizations WHERE data_to_anonymize->'city' = 'New York' OR data_to_anonymize->'country' = 'USA' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM organizations WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND data_to_anonymize->'year_established' <= 2000 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Organizations;
SELECT org_name FROM Organizations WHERE org_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AnonymizedData;
SELECT user_id, data_value FROM AnonymizedData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT org_id, org_name FROM Organizations ORDER BY org_name DESC;
SELECT org_id, org_name FROM Organizations
SELECT org_name, org_id FROM Organizations ORDER BY org_name DESC
SELECT * FROM AnonymizedData WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT data_value FROM AnonymizedData WHERE data_id = 50
SELECT * FROM Organizations JOIN AnonymizedData ON Organizations.org_id = AnonymizedData.user_id
SELECT * FROM Organization;
SELECT name FROM Organization WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data FROM UserData WHERE organization_id = 2;
SELECT name, data FROM Organization JOIN UserData ON Organization.id = UserData.organization_id;
SELECT id, anonymized_data FROM AnonymizedData WHERE organization_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Organization
SELECT name FROM Organization
SELECT * FROM UserData WHERE organization_id = 1
SELECT data FROM UserData WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT anonymized_data FROM AnonymizedData WHERE organization_id = 3
SELECT * FROM organizations;
SELECT name, location FROM organizations ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT data_id, data_type, data_value FROM user_data WHERE data_type = 'address';
SELECT original_data_id, anonymized_value FROM anonymized_data;
SELECT * FROM organizations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM organizations ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT users.username, organizations.name FROM users JOIN organizations ON users.organization_id = organizations.id;
SELECT data_type, COUNT(*) FROM user_data GROUP BY data_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT u.username, ud.data_type, a.anonymized_value FROM users u JOIN user_data ud ON u.user_id = ud.user_id JOIN anonymized_data a ON ud.data_id = a.original_data_id WHERE u.user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE organization_id = 3;
SELECT organization_id, org_name, org_type FROM organizations ORDER BY org_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, data_type, data_value FROM user_data WHERE data_type = 'address' LIMIT 10;
SELECT analysis_id, organization_id, analysis_type, analysis_date FROM data_analytics WHERE organization_id = 2 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE organization_id = 1 ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE organization_id = 2 AND last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;

SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, o.org_name FROM users u JOIN organizations o ON u.organization_id = o.organization_id WHERE u.creation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY u.last_name ASC, o.org_name DESC;

SELECT u.first_name, ud.data_type, ud.data_value FROM users u JOIN user_data ud ON u.user_id = ud.user_id WHERE ud.anonymized = TRUE AND ud.data_type IN ('address', 'phone') ORDER BY u.first_name, ud.data_type;

SELECT o.org_name, da.analysis_type, da.analysis_results FROM organizations o LEFT JOIN data_analytics da ON o.organization_id = da.organization_id WHERE da.analysis_date >= '2021-07-01' ORDER BY o.org_name, da.analysis_type ASC;
